content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) fueled by coal, currently smelting copper ore into copper plates.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (-21.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) fueled by coal, currently smelting copper ore into copper plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal, dropping into adjacent wooden chests.
- Wooden Chests at positions (52.5, -84.5) and (54.5, -84.5) storing extracted coal.

### Copper Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore, dropping into adjacent wooden chests.
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing extracted copper ore.

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-17.5, -69.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-16.5, -69.5) transferring items between chests.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore, currently out of fuel.
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -54.5) and (-12.5, -54.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items between chests.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) fueled by coal, currently lacking ingredients to smelt.
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Resources
- Ensure the entity from which you are trying to extract resources is not empty or depleted. Move closer to the entity and verify its status before attempting extraction.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the source chest or entity contains items that the inserter can pick up. Ensure the inserter is correctly positioned and configured to pick up items from the intended source.

### Errors with Mining Drills Out of Fuel
- Regularly check and refuel mining drills to ensure continuous operation. Monitor fuel levels and replenish as necessary to avoid interruptions in resource extraction.

### Errors with Furnaces Lacking Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Regularly supply furnaces with raw materials to maintain production efficiency.
